about_the_game:
A multi-colored wilderness with giant blossoms for trees, with more in store! Grab your allergy medicine and venture forth with the Flower Forest tileset for RPG Maker! Suitable for wilderness and also gardens!

The Flower Forest tileset includes:

Ground tiles:

Grass tiles in five colors – green, yellow, pink, blue and white!
Matching dirt paths and water tiles
Darker tall grass in all colors
Raised grass paths to match
Stone walkways
and more

Wall Tiles:

Leafy walls in 5 colors!

Also includes:

Staircases to match wall/floor patterns
HUGE FLOWERS! They’re big enough to walk around and under, easily filling the role of trees. These flowers also come in three smaller sizes to make your areas nice and varied.
Moonflowers, sunflowers, tulips and roses!
Three sizes of trees with matching blossoms
Fountains to match each flower type
Planters and hanging baskets
Matching pillars and arches
Crystal tubes to hold special blossoms (blank version available for your own objects)
Fence
Statues
Big round fountains
Little fountains
Lanterns
and more!


Events and Animations

Two sizes of fountain water, plus a fancy treasure box on a stand.

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
